description: When and why each of the 27 Legendary Nikes fell to corruption
note: OG Nike is not corrupted but is exhausted. The Coming Storm may change this.

corruptionReasons.exhaustion: Fought too long, forgot what they were fighting for
corruptionReasons.contract: Made a deal with Nolem for something they wanted
corruptionReasons.fulfillment: Found what they wanted in Nolem's service
corruptionReasons.ideology: Came to believe Nolem's way was better
corruptionReasons.curiosity: Wanted to understand Nolem from inside
corruptionReasons.grief: Lost something precious, Nolem offered to help forget
corruptionReasons.guilt: Did something terrible, couldn't live with it
corruptionReasons.identity-loss: Lost sense of self, Nolem offered wholeness
corruptionReasons.internal-conflict: Multiple minds couldn't agree, Nolem offered unity
corruptionReasons.curse: Something inside was always waiting to emerge

falls.name: Berjador Nike
falls.story: Held a dimensional breach for seven days. Never learned how to stop fighting. Nolem just let him burn until he forgot what he was fighting FOR.

falls.name: Bertus Maximus Nike
falls.story: A living weapon who found his purpose in endless war. Nolem offered enemies without end. He didn't resist. He didn't even hesitate.

falls.name: Dr Caleb Nike
falls.story: Wanted to understand Nolem from the inside. Believed he could find a weakness. He found only absorption.

falls.name: Phoenix Nike
falls.story: Died and reborn a thousand times. Just wanted to sleep. Nolem offered eternal rest.

falls.name: Ninja Nike
falls.story: Saw futures without hope. Made a contract to end the visions. The price was his freedom.

falls.name: Viking Nike
falls.story: Killed everything worth killing. Needed battle to feel alive. Nolem promised worthy opponents forever.

falls.name: Nel Nike
falls.story: Always fighting her own corruption. Believed she deserved to fall. Stopped fighting.

falls.name: Wolf Mode Nike
falls.story: The wolf was always there. Nolem didn't corrupt him. He just let the wolf out.

falls.name: Gladiator Nike
falls.story: Fighting was all he knew. When Nolem offered an arena spanning infinity, he signed the contract.

falls.name: Nike Tyson Nike
falls.story: The greatest boxer with no worthy opponents. Lonely at the top. Nolem offered the fight he craved.

falls.name: Cyberpunk Nike
falls.story: Believed the system was broken beyond repair. Came to see Nolem as inevitable progress.

falls.name: Colossal Nike
falls.story: Accidentally destroyed a dimension trying to save it. Couldn't live with what he'd done.

falls.name: Pigsterio Nike
falls.story: Used his power once and destroyed something precious. Let the guilt consume him.

falls.name: Olecram Nike
falls.story: Chimera who lost himself. Nolem promised to make him whole. The wholeness was absorption.

falls.name: Hydra Nike
falls.story: Multiple heads that couldn't agree on anything. Nolem offered silence. Unity. Peace.

falls.name: Cosmic Nike
falls.story: Saw the heat death of the universe. Everything ends. Why delay the inevitable?

falls.name: Peter Porker Nike
falls.story: With great power comes exhaustion. Carried too much alone for too long.

falls.name: Cardano Whale Nike
falls.story: Lost something in the dimensional currents. Nolem showed him how to forget.

falls.name: Professor Nike
falls.story: Details lost to history.

falls.name: Corey Hort Nike
falls.story: Details lost to history.

falls.name: Guthix Nike
falls.story: Details lost to history.

falls.name: Jedi Nike
falls.story: Details lost to history.

falls.name: Elbonzys Nike
falls.story: Details lost to history.

falls.name: McJared Nike
falls.story: The odds were 99.7% that Nolem wins. He's just being rational.

falls.name: Satoshi Nike
falls.story: Built systems meant to last forever. Nothing lasts forever. The regret consumed him.

falls.name: Melon Nike
falls.story: Chose to join Nolem. Community vote determines fate.

falls.name: OG Nike
falls.story: Template. Exhausted from carrying 5,555 souls. The Coming Storm may change this.

totalCount.note: OG Nike is the only Legendary Nike not corrupted (but he is exhausted)
